title: Curriculum vitae
content: In English, a curriculum vitae (English:  / ... ˈviːtaɪ, -ˈwiːtaɪ, -ˈvaɪtiː/,[1][2][3][4] Latin for "course of life", often shortened to CV) is a short written summary of a person's career, qualifications, and education. This is the most common usage in British English.[2][4] In North America, the term résumé (also spelled resume) is used, referring to a short career summary.[5][6]
